shared_text:
MEDFITTV.ORG
Stress Management - MedFit TV

Sports Physical Therapy & Performance Center
March 29 at 11:56 AM ¬∑

Schedules have all changed, whether it's for work, family or fun. We are going back to more simple times when the kids or grandkids played outside in the yard, when we exercised by going for walks or bike rides, when we played board or card games with the family, when we called people on the phone to check in.

We know this can be a stressful time for everyone. It is important to get your mind off of the world's problems. Mental health can be just as important as physical health, so take some time off for yourself. Turn off the TV or radio. Take a break from searching the internet for updated news.

Have you ever tried meditation, particularly guided meditation?

Check out this quick 2 minute video https://medfittv.org/community-channels/stress-management/ .

There are longer videos online, but start with a short one to get a taste, and see if you like it.

Remember, stay active...stay healthy...stay in touch...we hope to see everyone soon!
